Content: Major General A.S Ariyasingha assumed office as the 7th General Officer Commanding (GOC) of the 14 Division during a brief ceremony, held at his office in Colombo on Monday (6). The newly-appointed GOC signed an official document and symbolized the acceptance of the new appointment amid religious observances. Deputy General Officer Commanding, Brigade Commanders, Staff Officers of the Division and Commanding Officers attended the occasion.
